item.title: Introduction
item.description: Resources https://gobyexample.com/ https://golang.org/doc/#references https://golang.org/ref/spec https://golang.org/doc/effective_go.html Attachments Go in Action.pdf (8645 kB) The Go Programming Language - Donovan, Alan A. A. & Kernigha_6127.pdf (5182 kB) Why use Go Lang ?? Go is created by Google they hit a wall with the real world use cases , they were disappointed with other languages to take the load , Ken thompson (B, C , Unix , UTF-8) Rob Pike (Unix, UTF-8) Robert Greisemer (Hotspot , JVM) And a few other engineers at google Go at Google: Language Design in the Service of Software Engineering - Rob Pike Article Another BLog
